Utilities

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utilities.Animation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class allows for animations to be made using Image2D's.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • addCell

        public boolean addCell(java.lang.String fileName)
        Will add a cell to the next open space. If no space is available, then returns false
        Parameters:
        fileName - the string path of the sprite
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful, false if no space is available in the array
